bulletPoints: Developed and maintained a full-stack application using TypeScript and Java (Spring Boot), streamlining the onboarding of 100+ new facilities and increasing operational capacity by 15% since the start of the fiscal year.
Enhanced backend performance and scalability through service and query optimization, supporting a 15% year-over-year increase in order volume and 8% projected annual revenue growth.
Enhanced front-end workflows and user experience through responsive UI and caching improvements, enabling 20% year-over-year growth in unique users.
Developed reusable D3.js visualization components, cutting chart development time by 70% and promoting UI consistency across internal analytics tools.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs for RFID-integrated systems, delivering real-time inventory synchronization and improving stock accuracy.
Built event-driven microservices leveraging Google Cloud Pub/Sub, boosting item processing efficiency by 50% and ensuring reliable asynchronous workflows.
Accelerated development speed by 20% through AI-assisted coding tools such as GitHub Copilot, improving productivity and code quality.
Collaborated cross-functionally in an Agile environment, contributing to design discussions, conducting PR reviews, and ensuring high-quality production releases.
Delivered 5 production-ready features using React and Spring Boot within 10 weeks, directly enhancing user experience and product adoption.
Implemented a CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions and AWS EC2, reducing release time and enabling continuous delivery.
Maintained 80% test coverage through unit and integration testing, improving reliability and minimizing bugs.
Led weekly lab sessions for 50+ students and designed 20+ hands-on coding challenges in C++, reinforcing key data structures and algorithms concepts.

projects.name: Brain Tumors Classification
projects.description: Achieved 91% accuracy in categorizing brain tumors by developing and training a ResNet-50 model on 3,000+ MRI images.

projects.name: Job Scheduler
projects.description: Designed and implemented a database-driven cron scheduler in Spring Boot, allowing dynamic task registration and rescheduling at runtime via RESTful APIs.

projects.name: Internship Recommender
projects.description: Implemented a content-based recommendation system to match resumes with relevant job opportunities, and developed a Python/Selenium web-scraping pipeline to ingest 600+ internship listings, enabling large-scale data analysis.
